title: A serious and pathetical contemplation of the mercies of God in several most devout and sublime thanksgivings for the same / published by the Reverend Doctor Hicks at the request of a friend of the authors.
author: Traherne, Thomas, d. 1674.
notes: Attributed to Thomas Traherne. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
